elementary OS is designed to run on any: elementary OS didesain untuk berjalan pada laptop atau komputer baru berasitektur 32-bit atau 64-bit. Pada bagian ini, kita akan membahas kebutuhan sistem dan persyaratan lainnya untuk memasang elementary OS di komputer anda
If you haven't already, you will need to: Jika anda belum melakukannya, anda harus mengunduh elementaryOS dari halaman utama kami.. Anda perlu menyalin berkas ISO yang telah diunduh ke USB flash drive menggunakan panduan dibawah.
elementary OS is currently built for two: elementary OS saat ini dibangun untuk dua arsitektur processor, yaitu 32-bit dan 64-bit.
If you know you have a newer computer wi: Jika anda memiliki komputer terbaru dengan arsitektur processor 64-bit, pilih versi 64-bit.
If your computer is older or you do not: Jika komputer anda merupakan komputer lama atau anda tidak tahu tipe processor yang anda miliki, pilih versi 32-bit (processor 64-bit akan tetap bisa menjalankan versi ini).
Make sure to back your important data up: Pastikan untuk mencadangkan data penting anda ke lokasi eksternal seperti layanan cloud atau hard drive eksternal. Memasang sistem operasi baru mungkin menimpa data anda.
Begin with a spare USB flash drive with: Mulai dengan stik USB flash drive dengan ruang bebas tersedia setidaknya 1GB.
You'll also need a small application cal: You'll also need a small application called Rufus. You'll have to download it from its website and open the downloaded file to launch it. It will open a window like the one below:
You can now insert your USB drive and se: You can now insert your USB drive and select it in the "Device" list. After that, you'll have to select "ISO Image" in "Create a bootable disk using..." and click
to choose the ISO that you downloaded pr: untuk memilih berkas ISO yang telah anda unduh sebelumnya.
Click \"Start\", then just wait for the: Klik "Mulai", lalu tunggu proses hingga selesai.
OS X, Ubuntu, and others: OS X, Ubuntu, dan yang lainnya
You'll also need a small application cal: You'll also need a small application called UNetbootin. To install it in Ubuntu, just click this link. In OS X you'll have to download it from its website and open the downloaded file to install it.
Open UNetbootin from the Dash in Ubuntu: Buka UNetbootin melalui Dash pada Ubuntu atau Launchpad pada OS X. Maka akan muncul sebuah jendela seperti dibawah ini:
Make sure \"Diskimage\" is selected, and: Pastikan "Diskimage" terpilih, dan klik "..." untuk memilih berkas ISO yang telah anda unduh sebelumnya. Lepas semua disk USB selain yang akan anda gunakan. Klik "OK" dan tunggu proses sampai selesai.
In order to start the installation proce: In order to start the installation process, you must boot your computer from the install drive. This process may differ depending on the type of computer you have. This guide covers the most common use cases.
Assuming that your computer is still on,: Dengan asumsi bahwa komputer Anda masih menyala, mulai dengan memasukkan drive instalasi  anda dan restart komputer Anda.
Most computers will briefly allow you to: Most computers will briefly allow you to change the boot order for this boot only by pressing a special key — usually <kbd>F12</kbd>, but sometimes <kbd>Esc</kbd> or another function key. Refer to the screen or your computer's documentation to be sure.
Press <kbd>F12</kbd> (or the appropriate: Press <kbd>F12</kbd> (or the appropriate key) and select the install drive—usually "USB-HDD" or something containing the word "USB", but the wording may vary. If you choose the incorrect drive, your computer will likely continue to boot as normal. Just restart your computer and pick a different drive in that menu.
Shortly after selecting the appropriate: Shortly after selecting the appropriate boot drive, you should be presented with the elementary OS splash screen. You may now follow the on-screen instructions which will guide you through the rest of the process.
After you hear the chime, press and hold: Setelah anda mendengar suara, tekan dan tahan <kbd>Option</kb>. Lalu, pilih boot drive yang sesuai. Perhatikan bahwa hal tersebut mungkin salah diidentifikasi sebagai "Windows", namun hal tersebut normal.
